verb.definition: Bring together or into contact so that a real or notional link is established.
verb.example: The two towns are connected by a bridge.

verb.definition: Link to a power or water supply.
verb.example: Connect the printer to the computer.

noun.definition: A relationship in which a person, thing, or idea is linked or associated with something else.
noun.example: There is a connection between the two events.

noun.definition: The action of linking one thing with another.
noun.example: The connection of the cables was difficult.

usage_examples: I need to connect my laptop to the Wi-Fi.
The story connects two different historical events.
